TopicTitle: You've restored my faith in humanity

Articles.Content: I've always viewed the desire to learn and explore as fundamental and vital characteristics of human nature. I have become some what disheartened with this idea as a result of the lack of progress being made especially in space exploration. But seeing all the enthusiasm on the community to go out there, do cools things and push the envelope has restored my faith. I thank you.

In fact I did though the same way as you do.

Human love exploring things.

But now, after almot a year on ksp, I can say this :

"Human love exploding things"

Bread and circus.

These are the needs and wants of majority. Always where, always will be.
